member.name: IViewObject2.GetExtent
member.summary: Retrieves the size that the specified view object will be drawn on the specified target device.
member.param: Requested view of the object whose size is of interest. Possible values are taken from the and enumerations. Note that newer objects and containers that support optimized drawing interfaces support the DVASPECT2 enumeration values. Older objects and containers that do not support optimized drawing interfaces may not support DVASPECT2.
The portion of the object that is of interest. Currently, the only possible value is -1.
A pointer to the structure defining the target device for which the object's size should be returned.
A pointer to where the object's size is returned.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: An appropriate cache is not available.

summary.para: An extension to the interface which returns the size of the drawing for a given view of an object. You can prevent the object from being run if it isn't already running by calling this method instead of .
Like the interface, IViewObject2 cannot be marshaled to another process. This is because device contexts are only effective in the context of one process.
The OLE-provided default implementation provides the size of the object in the cache.
